title: California moves to dismantle nation's largest death row - Associated Press
content: California moves to dismantle nation's largest death row  Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) â€” California Gov. Gavin Newsom, who three years ago placed a moratorium on executions, now is moving to dismantle the United States' largest death row by moving all condemned inmates to other prisons within two years.
